table.sql: INSERT INTO mdb_isoCountries SELECT a.countryId, 'de', b.countryNameDE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, a.countryCode, NULL, NULL, NULL, b.microsoftId, 1, getdate() FROM mdb_isoCountries a, mdb_countries b WHERE a.type = 'Independent State' AND a.countryCode = b.shortName AND a.countryCode != ''
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT DISTINCT abteilung FROM cms_members WHERE jobtype = 'njur'
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT idcount, divId, 100 FROM cms_members m, mdb_divisions d WHERE m.abteilung = d.divName and m.jobtype='njur'

CREATE TRIGGER %%dsttable%%_tru ON %%dsttable%% WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER FOR UPDATE AS DECLARE @rowId INT SELECT @rowId = rowId FROM deleted DECLARE @sysUsr char(30); SET @sysUsr = SYSTEM_USER; BEGIN INSERT INTO %%dsttable%%Archive SELECT * FROM deleted UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET lastChange = getDate(), sysusr = @sysUsr WHERE rowId = @rowId END

CREATE TRIGGER %%dsttable%%_tru ON %%dsttable%% WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER FOR UPDATE AS DECLARE @locId INT SELECT @locId = locId FROM deleted DECLARE @sysusr char(30); SET @sysusr = SYSTEM_USER; BEGIN INSERT INTO %%dsttable%%Archive SELECT * FROM deleted UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET lastChange = getDate(), sysusr = @sysusr WHERE locId = @locId END
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT DISTINCT bankName, bankCode, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, bankSwift FROM mdb_locations a WHERE bankName IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT DISTINCT a.bankId, b.comName, c.bankAccount, c.bankIban, NULL FROM mdb_banks a, mdb_companies b, mdb_locations c, mdb_companyLocations d WHERE a.bankSwift = c.bankSwift AND b.comId = d.comId AND c.locId = d.locId

INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT DISTINCT b.comId, c.locId, a.accId FROM mdb_accounts a, mdb_companies b, mdb_locations c, mdb_companyLocations d WHERE a.accNumber = c.bankAccount AND b.comId = d.comId AND c.locId = d.locId
ALTER TABLE mdb_locations DROP COLUMN bankName
ALTER TABLE mdb_locations DROP COLUMN bankIban
ALTER TABLE mdb_locations DROP COLUMN bankSwift
ALTER TABLE mdb_locations DROP COLUMN bankCode
ALTER TABLE mdb_locations DROP COLUMN bankAccount
ALTER TABLE mdb_locationsArchive DROP COLUMN bankName
ALTER TABLE mdb_locationsArchive DROP COLUMN bankIban
ALTER TABLE mdb_locationsArchive DROP COLUMN bankSwift
ALTER TABLE mdb_locationsArchive DROP COLUMN bankCode
ALTER TABLE mdb_locationsArchive DROP COLUMN bankAccount

CREATE TRIGGER %%dsttable%%_tru ON %%dsttable%% WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER FOR UPDATE AS DECLARE @rowId INT SELECT @rowId = rowId FROM deleted DECLARE @sysUsr char(30); SET @sysUsr = SYSTEM_USER; BEGIN INSERT INTO %%dsttable%%Archive SELECT * FROM deleted UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET lastChange = getDate(), sysusr = @sysUsr WHERE rowId = @rowId END
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET posId = rowId
ALTER TABLE %%dsttable%% ALTER COLUMN posId int NOT NULL

Xtable.sql: ALTER TABLE %%dsttable%% ALTER COLUMN areaId int NOT NULL
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET areaType = (SELECT TOP 1 3 FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.areaId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId ) WHERE areaType IS NULL
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET areaType = (SELECT TOP 1 2 FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.subCatId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType IS NULL
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET areaType = (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.catId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType IS NULL
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET parentId = (SELECT TOP 1 catId FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.subCatId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType = 2
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET parentId = (SELECT TOP 1 subCatId FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.areaId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType = 3
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET areaLinkUrl = (SELECT TOP 1 linkUrl FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.areaId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType = 3
UPDATE mdb_areasOfLaw SET sortOrder = (SELECT TOP 1 sortOrder FROM mdb_domains WHERE mdb_domains.subCatId = mdb_areasOfLaw.areaId) WHERE areaType = 2

table.sql: UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET publisherId = rowId
ALTER TABLE %%dsttable%% ALTER COLUMN publisherId int NOT NULL
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrId = rowId
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET sortOrder = 1 WHERE sortOrder IS NULL
ALTER TABLE %%dsttable%% ALTER COLUMN adrId int NOT NULL
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET locId = (SELECT TOP 1 locId FROM mdb_locations WHERE mdb_locations.oldId = %%dsttable%%.locId )
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET comId = (SELECT TOP 1 comId FROM mdb_companyLocations WHERE mdb_companyLocations.locId = %%dsttable%%.locId )
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrEmail = (SELECT TOP 1 email FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrPhoneExt = (SELECT TOP 1 phoneExt FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrFaxExt = (SELECT TOP 1 faxExt FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrBuilding = (SELECT TOP 1 building FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrBuildingFloor = (SELECT TOP 1 buildingFloor FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrRoomNumber = (SELECT TOP 1 roomNumber FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrOfficeMobile = (SELECT TOP 1 oMobile FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET adrPrivateMobile = (SELECT TOP 1 pMobile FROM mdb_users WHERE mdb_users.userId = %%dsttable%%.userId)

CREATE VIEW mdb_viewPhoneList AS SELECT a.userId, b.locId, c.city, b.comId, com.comName, up.posId, pos.posTitle, initial, title, firstName, middleName, nobleName, lastName, displayName, birthday, (phonePrefix + adrPhoneExt) as phone, adrEmail FROM mdb_users a, mdb_userPositions up, mdb_positions pos, mdb_userAddresses b LEFT JOIN mdb_companies com ON b.comId = com.comId, mdb_locations c WHERE a.userId = b.userId AND a.locale = 'en' AND b.locale = 'en' AND c.locale = 'en' AND b.locId = c.locId AND pos.posId = up.posId AND pos.locale = 'en' AND (b.comId = up.comId OR up.comId IS NULL) AND a.userId = up.userId;
UPDATE %%dsttable%% SET fncId = rowId
ALTER TABLE %%dsttable%% ALTER COLUMN fncId int NOT NULL
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT b.userId, a.ses_counter, a.ses_order FROM cms_sessions a, mdb_users b WHERE b.initial = a.initial
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT ses_counter, 'de', ses_titel_de, ses_body_de, ses_link, ses_date, ses_status, ses_type, getdate() FROM cms_sessions
INSERT INTO %%dsttable%% SELECT ses_counter, 'en', ses_titel_en, ses_body_en, ses_link, ses_date, ses_status, ses_type, getdate() FROM cms_sessions
